item.title: Traffic light not detecting traffic, 21st October
item.description:
Traffic light is not detecting traffic coming from tewkesbury road direction onto High Street at junction with pool way. Cars need to wait for other vehicles coming up the High Street towards Tewkesbury Road to activate the lights
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Poole Way, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Blocked drain and cover bouncing loose, 20th October
item.description:

item.title: Street light not working, 20th October
item.description:
The street light opposite 83 Village Road is not working. Others on Village Road have also been reported. (light next to 95 Village road and those near New Dawn Place).This is a recurring problem but the fix never seems to last.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50;52, Village Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken drain cover, 20th October
item.description:
Finlay way Bishops Cleeve at junction with The Cloisters it is a sunken manhole / drain cover has been like this for a while but getting worse -requires driving round not over !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: 10 inch poth hole on Gambles Lane, 20th October
item.description:
Hole 100 yards before Gambles house coming from Woodmancote

item.title: Water not draining away outside school again., 20th October
item.description:
Multiple drains outside Swindon Village Primary School are blocked causing a large build up of water into the road. Traffic not slowing down or going around the huge puddle is causing children and parents being soaked on the footpath.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Church Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Diversion signs left on verge, 20th October
item.description:
Diversion signs x2 used 2 months ago are still on the verge and should have been removed by the contractor. This has been reported multiple times but no action has been taken.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Norton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Unpermitted roadworks problem, 20th October
item.description:
Police Control report that the temporary TS in the location are stuck on green in all directions. They are wary of the reporter's intentions, as this report arrived via email and there have been no further reports on this stretch of road.
Report on FixMyStreet
